channel.title: Monetary Policy on Skycoin Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Monetary Policy on Skycoin Blog

item.title: Skycoin Perspective on Monetary Policy
item.description: What makes me the most sad, is that there are developers who bought in to Bitcoin at pennies. They made a lot of money already and very few of them gave back to the community or created something that moved the community forward. Everything is a money grab. We have hundreds of money grab altcoins. Gimmicks. Whole cartels devoted to pump and dumps. Bitcoin is still in a penny stock and show pony, gimmick mentality.
